triples.name: Isabelle (proof assistant)
triples.relevance: Isabelle/HOL is the proof assistant that the paper extends to reconstruct SMT proofs.

triples.name: Higher-order logic
triples.relevance: HOL is the logical foundation of Isabelle/HOL used throughout the paper.

triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: SMT solving is the core technique used by external theorem provers integrated with Sledgehammer.

triples.name: Cooperating Validity Checker
triples.relevance: cvc5 is extended in this paper to produce proofs in the Alethe format.

triples.name: Automated theorem proving
triples.relevance: Automated theorem proving is the problem domain that Sledgehammer and SMT solvers address.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification is the ultimate goal of proof reconstruction and certification.

triples.name: Formal proof
triples.relevance: The paper proposes methods for reconstructing and verifying formal proofs from SMT solvers.
